modName: Perfect Touch Perk works in Essential Characters
summary: A little mod wich improve the Pickpocket perk \'Perfect Touch\'
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=150]Description[/size][/b]

\'Perfect Touch\' is the last perk in the Pickpocket Tree, he permits steal equiped armor from NPCs, however, he doesn\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\'t works in essential characters, this mod changes this.

With my mod, you will be able to steal armor or clothes from nearly all characters on Skyrim, as you can see in the images.

[b][size=150]Warning[/size][/b]

Some NPCs are specially protected, Jarls, for example, you can\'t steal from these NPCs, sorry.

[b][size=150]Questions[/size][/b]

[b]The armor respawn?[/b]
I don\'t know in this moment, just give me some time and i will answer

[b]Why you did this mod?[/b]
Because i can and because i want.


And more one thing...

\'If you get caught, don\'t blame on me!\'
author: SeniorDiogo
